32.desc: Sets left margin of text display. Range 0-39.

33.desc: Sets width of text display. Range 1-40.

34.desc: Sets top margin of text display. Range 0-23.

35.desc: Sets bottom margin of text display. Range 0-24.

36.desc: Horizontal position of the cursor. Range 0-39.

37.desc: Vertical position of the cursor. Range 0-23.

1013.desc: Action to take upon issuing `&` command

1019.desc: Action to take upon non-maskable interrupt

-16384.label: 80STORE
-16384.desc: Overloaded. [1] read the keyboard (read) [2] Set `PAGE2` function to normal (write)
-16384.ctx: Enhanced Apple //e or higher needed for [2]

-16383.label: 80STORE
-16383.desc: Set `PAGE2` function to control the memory bank used for display storage, write only.

-16304.label: TEXT

-16303.desc: Switch to text mode. Mode depends on other soft switch settings.

-16302.label: MIXED

-16301.label: MIXED
-16301.desc: Switch to mixed graphics and text. Mode depends on other soft switch settings.

-16300.label: PAGE2
-16300.desc: Overloaded. [1] Page 2 off, switch to page 1. Mode depends on other soft switch settings. [2] Switch to main display memory if `80STORE` is on.
-16300.ctx: Enhanced Apple //e or higher needed for [2]

-16299.label: PAGE2
-16299.desc: Overloaded. [1] Page 2 on, switch to page 2. Mode depends on other soft switch settings. [2] Switch to auxiliary display memory if `80STORE` is on.
-16299.ctx: Enhanced Apple //e or higher needed for [2]

-16298.label: HIRES
-16298.desc: Switch to low resolution mode. Mode depends on other soft switch settings.

-16297.label: HIRES
-16297.desc: Switch to high resolution mode. Mode depends on other soft switch settings.

-16295.desc: Set game control annunciator output 0 to low (on).

-16293.desc: Set game control annunciator output 1 to low (on).

-16292.desc: Set game control annunciator output 2 to high (off).

-16291.desc: Set game control annunciator output 2 to low (on).

-16290.label: DHR
-16290.desc: Overloaded. [1] set game control annunciator output 3 to high (off) [2] switch to double resolution graphics

-16289.desc: Set game control annunciator output 3 to low (on).
